scripts.build: npm version patch && microbundle && microbundle -f modern --external none && npm run ts:copy
scripts.build:beta: npm version prerelease --preid=beta && microbundle && microbundle -f modern --external none && npm run ts:copy
scripts.reinstall: rm -rf node_modules && rm package-lock.json && npm install
scripts.ts:copy: cp ts/index.d.ts build/userfront-core.d.ts; cp ts/index.d.ts build/userfront-core.modern.d.ts; cp ts/index.d.ts build/userfront-core.module.d.ts; cp ts/index.d.ts build/userfront-core.umd.d.ts
scripts.watch: microbundle watch --external none && npm run ts:copy
